overture is an iterative expansion to the base game with largely the same strengths creative enemies good npc storylines and shortcomings extremely linear level design uneven boss quality its a little lean at this price point  be prepared for an intense difficulty spike at the final boss if playing solo on legendary stalker its one of the toughest encounters in any video game and something that the rest of the game doesnt prepare you for
